items.description: Avoid asserting versions/env values not present in the issue.
Structured output should be valid when schema is expected.
Clear classification and extracted details for the YTM pipeline.
items.instructions: Classifies the issue correctly (config, runtime error, docs, UI, Kafka, Spark, recommender). Extracts key details like .env settings, docker-compose usage, component (simulator/enricher/spark/recommender/ui), and symptoms.
